title: knife
description: This is the utility knife that everyone uses from time to time.
data: It looks like it has been recently sharpened
secretData: Although the edge is clean, the black light reveals blood stains on the rest of the blade. None of the food onboard has blood in it.

title: wrench
description: This is a space wrench used for both internal repairs and for use on spacewalks.
data: This old wrench has seen a lot of wear an tear in its lifetime. There are many scratches on its surface.
secretData: The blacklight shows blood in all of the scratches even though the rest of the wrench is clean.

title: keyboard
description: This keyboard is malfunctioning and many of the keys don't work.
data: It's possible that cosmic rays have fried the electrical components of the keyboard.
secretData: Shining the blacklight on the keyboard shows blood hidden under the keys.

title: candlestick
description: This is an ornate silver candlestick broght onboard by an excentric billionare that toured the station last year.
data: The candlestick is very solid and heavy. You wonder how they managed to smuggle something so useless onto the ISS.
secretData: The blacklight confirms your suspicion that the victem was struck with a blunt object. The candlestick was recently covered in blood.

title: rubber chicken
description: This stowaway has been onboard for decades. It's a little sticky in places and smells funny.
data: You don't know why, but something about this rubber chicken makes you uncomfortable.
secretData: When you examine the rubber chicken under the black light, you find evidence that it was used to choke the victim.
